snippet: Transformation of the Rolling Mill Hill section has undergone fits and starts in the last 14 years, but now it is progressing rapidly.
abstract: Nashville's Rolling Mill Hill section has been in some stage of redevelopment for 14 years; it is being rehabilitated as a mixed-use community, with $50 million invested and another $150 million in commercial and residential investment expected in coming years.
lead_paragraph: Transformation of the Rolling Mill Hill section has undergone fits and starts in the last 14 years, but now it is progressing rapidly.

headline.seo: Redevelopment of Rolling Mill Hill Area in Nashville Accelerates
headline.main: Reversing Years of Neglect on a Hill Above Nashville
headline.print_headline: Reversing Years of Neglect on a Hill Above Nashville
